name: nysc-daura-zone-ops
description: A workplace application for Zonal and Local Government Inspectors of the NYSC Daura zone.

scripts.build: esbuild index.tsx --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/main.js --loader:.ts=ts --loader:.tsx=tsx --define:GEMINI_API_KEY=\"$GEMINI_API_KEY\" --define:process.env.NODE_ENV=\"production\" && cpx index.html dist/ && cpx "public/**/*" dist/public/
